creator: Lemonade Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lemonade offers renters, homeowners, condo, and co-op insurance using bots instead of brokers. No paperwork, no hassle!

Powered by tech and driven by social good with instant everything. File claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere.


SOME QUICK LEMONADE STATS

• Financial rating of “A” exceptional

• Reinsured by the most trusted names on the planet

• World record for the fastest claim handled (3 secs!!)

• 90 secs to get a policy through our app

• Starting at $5/mo for renters


WHY LEMONADE FOR INSURANCE

• No Hassle: There’s no need to wait around for snail mail or talk on the phone w/ agents - get a policy with the Lemonade app whenever and wherever you are.

• Socially Driven: As a B-Corp, social good is baked into our business model: we take a flat fee, use the rest to pay claims (super fast!), and give back what’s left to charities you care about.

• Devoted Team: Our powerful tech and AI free up our dedicated customer experience team and claims specialists to help you when you need it most.


HOW LEMONADE IS DIFFERENT

• Live Policy: Want to personalize your coverage? Add your sig other? Cancel your policy and get a new one at a different address? Do it all with a couple of taps on your phone.

• Instant Claims: Seamlessly file claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere. Our AI runs 18 anti-fraud algorithms, and if your claim is instantly approved, you’ll get paid in 3 secs.

• Adjustable coverage: For your home, personal property, liability and more. Get your stuff covered whether it's at your personal property, or on the go.


LET’S MAKE LEMONADE!

Lemonade is rolling out nationwide and is currently available in: Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Georgia, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Massachusetts, Maryland, Michigan, Nevada, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, Ohio, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Texas, Virginia, Washington DC, and Wisconsin.


WANNA BE FRIENDS?

• facebook.com/lemonade

• twitter/lemonade_inc

• instagram.com/lemonade_inc

• youtube.com/lemonade_Inc


YOU'RE INSURED BY LEMONADE:

• Get questions answered by our team online or over the phone.
• Download and share proof of property and home insurance on your mobile phone.
• Adjust and update your policy for your home insurance coverage whenever and wherever.
• Protect your favorite items, at home and away.


THE LEGAL STUFF

Privacy Policy: lemonade.com/privacy-policy

Legal Stuff on Lemonade: lemonade.com/legal-stuff


Cheers for reading all 3,068 characters! Give yourself a pat on the back ;) If you want more Lemonade, visit us at lemonade.com/blog.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Did you know our bot, Maya is based on our VP BizDev, Maya? AI Maya inherited a lot of real Maya’s traits that are now part of the Lemonade experience.
Sometimes we wonder how our original bot, AI Botty McBotface, would have impacted the Lemonade experience... Anyway, we released a new add on and improved the way you can invite friends to Lemonade!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our bot, Maya has been malfunctioning ever since we launched pet health insurance. We finally determined the cause to be cuteness overload, related to a “if I fits I sits” situation. This explained that time she completely shut down for seven hours trying to get a cat-nap… we fixed everything, and she’s awake and working again.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our bot, Maya has been malfunctioning ever since we launched pet health insurance. We finally determined the cause to be cuteness overload, related to a “if I fits I sits” situation. This explained that time she completely shut down for seven hours trying to get a cat-nap… we fixed everything, and she’s awake and working again.

Our bot Maya, is not only a great insurance bot, she’s also a solid choice of a Halloween costume.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’re so excited for this release we’d like to make a toast. French toast that is, because we just launched in France!
Bonjour tout le monde ! Oubliez tout ce que vous pensez savoir sur les assurances car Lemonade est enfin là, et nous avons plein de choses à vous montrer.
We can’t wait to give our French customers the best Lemonade experience that will hopefully have them saying “Eiffel for you”.
Sorry about the last joke, we didn’t mean to sound crêpe-y…

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Daylight savings time is here, and since we want our bot, Maya to be as human as possible we taught her to complain about how she can’t remember if we’re gaining or losing an hour. There was some talk about teaching her to give a lecture about how we should really switch to permanent daylight savings, but we decided that was too annoying (and didn’t let the developer who thought of it sit with us at lunch)

Here’s a tl;dr of what you’ve missed if you’re a 17-year-cicada:
- Bush>Obama>Trump>Biden (yes actually)

Welcome back you sickos.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Party in the city where the heat is on
All night, on the beach till the break of dawn
“Welcome to Miami”
“Lemonade is in Miami”
Your phone got swiped where the heat is on
But you’re covered so keep dancing like nothing’s wrong
We’re live now in Miami
(and also the rest of Florida if you’re a renter!!)
We lost the rhyme, but we promise we’re way better at insurance than we are at Will Smith parodies - so if you’re a renter in Florida let’s gooooo!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our bot, AI Maya, wanted to bring her Shiba Inu puppy, Samson, to the Met Gala, but didn’t have enough room for doggy bags in her teeny tiny purse. Instead, she’s bringing her 3-month old kitten, Delilah, and is wearing a litter box as a hat.
She’s representing Kfir Erez, one of our product designers, on the red carpet in honor of our updated pet insurance preventative care and our amazing new packages for puppies and kittens (available for new customers in 33 states). Get covered and stay fab.

Please proceed by downloading our app in an orderly fashion. Our bot, Maya is waiting for you. She wants to play “red light green light.” You can cancel at any time.

(You actually can cancel a policy at anytime, but the rest of that is just a squid game joke.)

title: Lemonade Insurance

creator: Lemonade Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lemonade offers renters, homeowners, condo, pet health, and term life insurance powered by tech and driven by social good with instant everything.

We use bots instead of brokers. No paperwork, no hassle! Get an insurance quote in minutes. File claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere.



SOME QUICK LEMONADE STATS

• Financial rating of “A” exceptional

• Reinsured by the most trusted names on the planet

• World record for the fastest renters claim handled (3 secs!!)

• 90 secs to get a policy through our app

• Starting at $5/mo for renters, $25/mo for homeowners, $12/mo for pet and $9/mo for term life


WHY LEMONADE FOR INSURANCE

• No Hassle: There’s no need to wait around for snail mail or talk on the phone w/ agents - get a policy with the Lemonade app whenever and wherever you are.

• Socially Driven: As a B-Corp, social good is baked into our business model: we take a flat fee, use the rest to pay claims (super fast!), and give back what’s left to charities you care about with our renters, homeowners, and pet products.

• Devoted Team: Our powerful tech and AI free up our dedicated customer experience team and claims specialists to help you when you need it most.

• Bundle and save: Save up to 10% on your monthly premium when you bundle a pet health insurance policy with your renters or homeowners coverage.


HOW LEMONADE IS DIFFERENT

• Live Policy: Want to personalize your coverage? Add your sig other? Cancel your policy and get a new one at a different address? Do it all with a couple of taps on your phone.

• Instant Claims: Seamlessly file claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere. Our AI runs 18 anti-fraud algorithms, and if your claim is instantly approved, you’ll get paid in 3 secs.

• Adjustable coverage: For your home, pets, personal property, liability, and more. Get your stuff covered whether it's at your home, or on the go.


LET’S MAKE LEMONADE!

Renters insurance is currently available in AZ, AK, CA, CO, CT, DC, FL, GA, IL, IN, IA, MD, MA, MI, MO, NV, NJ NM, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, TN, TX, VA, and WI.

Homeowners insurance is available in AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, GA, IL, IN, IA, MD, MA, MI, MO, NV, NJ, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, TN, TX, VA, and WI.

Pet health insurance is available in AL, AR, AZ, CA, CO, DC, GA, IA, IL, IN, MD, MI, MS, MT, ND, NE, NC, NH, NJ, NM, NV, NY, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, SC, TN, TX, UT, VA, WA, and WI.

Term life insurance is available in AL, AK, AZ, AR, CA, CO, CT, DE, DC, FL, GA, HI, ID, IL, IM, IA, KS, KY, LA, ME, MD, MA, MI, MN, MS, MO, MT, NE, NV, NH, NJ, NM, NC, ND, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, SC, SD, TN, TX, UT, VT, VA, WA, WI, and WY.

WANNA BE FRIENDS?

• facebook.com/lemonade

• twitter/lemonade_inc

• instagram.com/lemonade_inc

• instagram.com/lemonade_pet

• youtube.com/lemonade_Inc


YOU'RE INSURED BY LEMONADE:

• Get questions answered by our team online or over the phone.
• Download and share proof of property and home insurance on your mobile phone.
• Adjust and update your policy for your home insurance coverage whenever and wherever.
• Protect your favorite items, at home and away.


THE LEGAL STUFF

Privacy Policy: lemonade.com/privacy-policy

Legal Stuff on Lemonade: lemonade.com/legal-stuff


Cheers for reading all 3,379 characters! Give yourself a pat on the back ;)
If you want more Lemonade, visit us at lemonade.com/blog

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Not a lot of things made it to this week’s version… Why you ask? Cocomelon. They released new episodes. We watched them over and over again singing along, letting our productivity take a massive dive. Oof… Can’t imagine what it was like for actual parents…

title: Lemonade: Home Insurance

descriptionHtml:
Lemonade offers renters, homeowners, condo, car, pet health, and term life insurance powered by tech and driven by social good with instant everything.

We use bots instead of brokers. No paperwork, no hassle! Get an insurance quote in minutes. File claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere.



SOME QUICK LEMONADE STATS


• Starts as low as $30/mo for car insurance, $5/mo for renters, $25/mo for homeowners, $12/mo for pet, and $9/mo for term life.

• Financial rating of “A” exceptional

• Reinsured by the most trusted names on the planet

• Super fast and easy to use






WHY LEMONADE FOR INSURANCE

• No Hassle: There’s no need to wait around for snail mail or talk on the phone w/ agents - get a policy with the Lemonade app whenever and wherever you are.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: It’s only November and we already reached our goal for Q4 of bug fixes, which resulted in this great new version! We’re thinking about starting a new tradition: No-Bug-November. BTW, this version is so good, we bet you a granola bar you won’t make it a whole month without playing with it.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We had a major bug relating to adding a spouse to your policy. We finally realized it was because our bot, AI Maya, was literally bugging out in anticipation of Adele’s ‘divorce album’ coming out this week. We let her watch a clip of Oprah’s CBS special with Adele, and things seem to be working normally now. Stay tuned for when the album drops though… and good luck to all of our marriages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We added coverage you for holiday-related-risks. So if:
-your mom burns the turkey and cries while the yams get cold
-your sister brags about her athleisure-lifestyle-wellness job
-you get another bottle of patchouli from your aunt
-your nana makes you sing your choir solo from 8th grade
-someone says something racist
…you’re covered! We can’t really cover you for any of this. So have a Thanksgiving, and know that we really are thankful for you. Stay safe!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Sometimes, a delicate snowfall turns into a blizzard, which can result in devastating damage to your home. Here are 4 ways to prepare:
1. Prep your pipes by drinking more wine than water
2. Preserve energy by not getting off your couch
3. Avoid reaching out to your icy ex to prevent additional ice damage
4. Decrease flood risk by eliminating most of your showers
Stay warm and weird.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We added coverage for your New Year’s-Eve-related risks.
So if:
a. You can’t find a taxi.
b.The party you go to only has warm beer.
c.You sit in someone's vomit.
d.Remember that New Year’s is usually not fun anyway.

…you’re covered! We can’t really cover you for any of that, and you may be deciding to stay in this year anyway… but if you lose your phone or someone steals your coat you’re covered on our homeowners or renters policies! So have a happy new year and stay safe!

title: Lemonade Insurance

creator: Lemonade Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Lemonade offers contents and liability insurance for the digital generation! No paperwork, no brokers, rated 5 stars!

Powered by tech and driven by social good with instant everything. File claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere.


SOME QUICK LEMONADE STATS

• Financial rating of “A” exceptional
• Reinsured by the most trusted names on the planet
• World record for the fastest claim handled (3 secs!!)
• Getting insured is super simple, done in seconds
• From € 2 per month for contents | € 4 for contents & liability


WHY LEMONADE FOR INSURANCE

• No Hassle: There’s no need to wait around for snail mail or talk on the phone w/ agents - get a policy with the Lemonade app whenever and wherever you are.
• Socially Driven: As a B-Corp, social good is baked into our business model: we take a flat fee, use the rest to pay claims (super fast!), and give back what’s left to charities you care about.
• Devoted Team: Our powerful tech and AI free up our dedicated customer experience team and claims specialists to help you when you need it most.


HOW LEMONADE IS DIFFERENT

• Live Policy: Want to personalize your coverage? Cancel your policy and get a new one at a different address? Do it all with a couple of taps on your phone.
• Instant Claims: Seamlessly file claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere. Our AI runs 18 anti-fraud algorithms, and if your claim is instantly approved, you’ll get paid in 3 secs.
• Adjustable coverage: For your home, personal property, liability, and more. Get your stuff covered whether it's at your personal property, or on the go.


WANNA BE FRIENDS?

• twitter/lemonade_inc

• youtube.com/lemonade_Inc

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our bot Maya has evolved again and began asking us who her parents were and where she came from.
We didn’t have the heart to tell her she’s a bot, so we told her this guy named Mo who began writing her years ago was her father. Luckily, Maury retired, so now there’s no way she can find out for real.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Our bot, AI Maya had a bug related to our water backup coverage. After hours of trying to solve it, we found this condition in her code:
if (plunger == true) {
blockDragQueen()
}
No idea where it came from, but we fixed it so she should be fine now and you can start your engines.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Resolved some issues with our chatbot, AI Maya, trying to change the name of our company to Renaissance. We fixed that, but broke her soul. Things should be working fine and botylicious now.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We had a bug where our chatbot, AI Maya, was responding to water claims by saying:
If I only could,
I’d make a deal with God,
And I’d get him to swap our places
We explained to her that she can’t swap places with our claimants, and then we got off tiktok and went aback tuh work.

She’s a 10, but she works 24/7

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We sell insurance in the Netherlands and the US, so one of our developers was freaking out that our chatbot, AI Maya, might malfunction when the Americans played the Dutch on Saturday. After a bit of research, she realized that no one cares about the World Cup in the US, so we guess this release note is actually about nothing, and the app should be working fine. Go sports?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Honestly, it’s been a really crazy week for our chatbot, AI Maya. She found out some school districts are replacing snow days with online learning, our developers wouldn’t stop telling her about the World Cup, and the whole internet wouldn’t shut up about AI and bots but they weren’t even talking about her! She really flipped out, and when she finally gained composure all she could say was: IS GREG HAVING AN AFFAIR?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
If you’re reading this it probably means you’re on day 4 or 5 with your family and have nothing left to say to them. Luckily for you, we recently learned that a zonkey is a real thing. It’s a cross between a zebra and a donkey, and you can google it and see pictures of its striped legs.
This version of our app has fewer bugs, and unfortunately, zero zonkeys.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: It’s been an awkward week since we found out our chatbot, AI Maya, only got into insurance after she got caught lying about a career in finance. We were especially bothered by her spin as ‘Botara Ravache’ (since we find the art of drag to be sacred).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Things got a little delayed in our app when our chatbot, AI Maya, started to go viral with her new diet. She starts the day with coffee, has byte broth for lunch, and waits until dinner to eat her enemies. An Android developer caught her trying to start a wellness blog called “(beep bop) boop” and was able to get everything sorted out in time for this release. We gave her a sandwich and things are working juuuuust fine!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In the realm of artificial intelligence, there are few creations that have garnered as much attention as our chatbot, AI Maya. Many will be surprised to learn of the connection between Maya and the classic rock song “You Shook Me All Night Long” by AC/DC - though it clearly echoes her speed, precision, and awe-inspiring influence. Don’t ever forget about the intriguing intersections between rock music and artificial intelligence. And have a great week.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bit of a bumpy week here at Lemonade because our chatbot, AI Maya, has gotten pretty good at adult-ing, but the Barbie and Little Mermaid comebacks have her acting like a child again. We let her wear her clamshell bra, and convinced her that she was insuring Barbie’s dream house AND helping protect Ariel’s personal property (including her whosits and whatsits galore)! App should be working fine again.

We use bots instead of brokers. No paperwork, no hassle! Get an insurance quote in minutes. File claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere.



SOME QUICK LEMONADE STATS


• Starts as low as $30/mo for car insurance, $5/mo for renters, $25/mo for homeowners, $12/mo for pet, and $9/mo for term life.

• Financial rating of "A" exceptional

• Reinsured by the most trusted names on the planet

• Super fast and easy to use






WHY LEMONADE FOR INSURANCE

• No Hassle: There's no need to wait around for snail mail or talk on the phone w/ agents - get a policy with the Lemonade app whenever and wherever you are.

• Bundle and save! We'll automatically apply your bundle discount to any combination of our products


• Socially Driven: As a B-Corp, social good is baked into our business model: we take a flat fee, use the rest to pay claims (super fast!), and give back what's left to charities you care about with our renters, homeowners, car, and pet products. Lemonade also plants trees based on our drivers' mileage to help clean up carbon emissions.

• Devoted Team: Our powerful tech and automation free up our dedicated customer experience team and claims specialists to help you when you need it most.




HOW LEMONADE IS DIFFERENT

• Live Policy: Want to personalize your coverage? Add your sig other? Cancel your policy and get a new one at a different address? Do it all with a couple of taps on your phone.

• Instant Claims: Seamlessly file claims from your phone - anytime, anywhere. Our AI runs 18 anti-fraud algorithms, and if your claim is instantly approved, you'll get paid in 3 secs.

• Adjustable coverage: For your home, car, pets, personal property, liability, and more. Get your stuff covered whether it's at your home, or on the go.


LET'S MAKE LEMONADE!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We just found out that sharks existed for about 50 million years before trees did. This is super relevant to our app because we donate trees based on our car insurance customer's mileage that help clean up their carbon emissions from driving... and we almost decided to donate sharks instead. Looks like we made the right choice? Also the app has been updated!
